version_description:
Introducing Noted 1.2 with Import Audio and timeline markers!

- Now you can import your pre-recorded files straight into the app!
- Small indicators in the playback bar let you know when a #timetag is coming up.
- We know you love Highlighti

Noted 1.2.1 includes various bug fixes and performance enhancements.
- Improved VoiceOver Accessibility & Dynamic Type rich text editing support
- Improved AirPods support
- Improved iPad experience in portrait mode
- Fixed crash when impo

Introducing Noted 1.3 with sketch!

Now you can doodle and express your creative thoughts through sketches! Use our wide range of brushes and make your notes even more beautiful, with full support for Apple Pencil.

Simply tap the NEW sketch

PDF Support for Noted+! You requested and we've listened!

Generate and export fresh looking documents (including images and tags) with your friends or colleagues.

Now you can doodle and express your creative thoughts t

Noted 1.3.2 includes various bug fixes and performance enhancements.

- Fixed: Images taken from the camera would go missing in rare cases
- Implemented auto-save! Notes are now saved more frequently while editing

Noted 1.3.6 includes various bug fixes and performance enhancements.
- Improved performance speeds when editing #timetag
- Fixed PDF exports turning out blank for larger content

Introducing Noted 1.4 with new features and redesigned UI!
We've listened to your feedback and made a few key changes to the app, so let us know your thoughts.

Introducing Noted 1.4 with new features and redesigned UI!
We've listened to your feedback and made a few key changes to the app, so let us know your thoughts.

What's new:
Action Bar - think of this as a centralised place for everything tha

Noted 1.4.2 includes various bug fixes and performance enhancements.
- Fixed a crash when opening note information
- Scrolls to tag position within note from tag search

----

Introducing Noted 1.4 with new features and redesigned UI!

Noted 1.4.3 includes various bug fixes and performance enhancements.

- Fixed an error when sharing notes with larger images
- Fixed quotes and bullet points rendering incorrectly when exporting as plain text
- Fixed an issue that prevented im

Noted 1.4.4 includes various bug fixes and performance enhancements.

- Fixed a bug that could prevent users from sharing notes via iCloud
- Displaying better error messages if audio fails to upload
- Fixed critical sync issues affecting some

Introducing Noted 1.5 with Apple Watch support!

-- Apple Watch --

Record audio anywhere right from your wrist. Quickly capture spontaneous conversations by just a tap and they'll be ready for you on your iPhone when you're done.

- Co

Noted 1.5.2 includes major bug fixes and stability improvements.

- Fixed some crashes that could affect audio recordings
- Recordings will automatically resume when possible after being interrupted, such as by phone calls or Siri
- Noted now

Noted 1.5.3 includes major bug fixes and stability improvements.

- Fixed a crash during playback when interrupted and app was in the background
- Watch Recordings: Duration now reflects the slider as you scrub over the audio

Apple Watch:<

Noted 1.5.4 includes major bug fixes and stability improvements.

- Fixed a crash during playback when interrupted and app was in the background
- Watch Recordings: Duration now reflects the slider as you scrub over the audio

Apple Watch:<

Noted 1.5.5 includes major bug fixes and stability improvements.

iCloud Sync:
We've rebuilt our syncing mechanism from the ground up, now it's blazing fast and optimised for efficiency.

- Now showing the created date under note info, as w

Noted 1.5.6 includes bug fixes and stability improvements.

- Fixed a critical bug related to notes with no content being re-downloaded
- Fixed a possible downloading loop for users with iCloud disabled

Now our blazing fast iCloud Sync sho

Noted 1.5.7 introduces URL schemes!

Directly open notes or notebooks from your other workflow apps. Just copy the link from the Note Info menu and paste away!

We've started by adding URL schemes for the most common actions:
New Note: not

Noted 1.5.8 includes bug fixes and stability improvements.

- You can now sort by titles.
- Created and edited date now shows the full format inside note information.
- Fixed a bug in iPad where the editor is not being updated after deleting i

Noted 1.5.9 includes bug fixes and stability improvements.

- Fixed a bug affecting recording time for notes created via URL scheme.

---

Introducing Noted 1.6 with Siri Shortcuts, Location Awareness Recording, and support for iOS 12 & WatchOS 5!

Noted is now smarter and faster than ever before.

• Siri Shortcuts
Create new notes by using just your voice. Custom phrases

Introducing Noted 1.6 with Siri Shortcuts, Location Awareness Recording, and support for iOS 12 & WatchOS 5!
Noted is now smarter and faster than ever before.

• Siri Shortcuts
Create new notes by using just your voice. Custom phrases can

Introducing Noted 1.6 with Siri Shortcuts, Location Awareness Recording, and support for iOS 12 & WatchOS 5!

Noted is now smarter and faster than ever before.

• Siri Shortcuts
Create new notes by using just your voice. Custom phrases

Introducing Noted 1.6 with Siri Shortcuts, Location Awareness Recording, and support for iOS 12 & WatchOS 5!

Noted is now smarter and faster than ever before.

• Siri Shortcuts
Create new notes by using just your voice. Custom phrases

Noted 1.6.4 includes bug fixes and stability improvements:

- Fixed an launch issue that affected some users after upgrading
- Fixed an issue where notes wouldn’t auto-save while app is in background
- Improved syncing performance for users wi

Noted 1.6.5 brings full support for latest iPhone models and all new Apple Watch Series 4!

With greatly enhanced UI, your Watch experience now feels more comfortable as you navigate around.

We've also brought over the small #timetag indicat

Noted 1.6.6 adds the ability to remove recordings.

Perhaps you hit record too soon or simply want to re-record - it is now possible to remove audio without deleting the whole note.

Just swipe left on the editor then tap the "settings" icon

A big update for the iPad Pro! Noted 1.7 takes sketches and drawing to the next level, with full support for the new Apple Pencil.

Tap anywhere on the editor using your pencil and start scribbling straightaway - even on existing images and sketches

A big update for the iPad Pro! Noted 1.7 takes sketches and drawing to the next level, with full support for the new Apple Pencil.
Tap anywhere on the editor using your pencil and start scribbling straightaway - even on existing images and sketches too

Noted 1.7.2 includes bug fixes and stability improvements.

- Photos taken within the app are now saved to the Camera Roll (You can toggle this within Settings)
- Fixed a bug where the recording could stop while taking a picture in split view

Noted 1.7.3 includes bug fixes and stability improvements.

- Photos taken within the app are now saved to the Camera Roll (You can toggle this within Settings)
- Fixed a bug where the recording could stop while taking a picture in split view

Noted 1.7.4 includes bug fixes and stability improvements.

- Photos taken within the app are now saved to the Camera Roll (You can toggle this within Settings)
- Fixed a bug where the recording could stop while taking a picture in split view

This update includes bug fixes and stability improvements.
---

Noted 1.7.6 adds indentation to the editor - allowing you to take control of the alignment to your text and images, as well as numbering and bullet indents.

It's now also possible to control the playback straight from your lock screen or Control Ce

各種不具合の修正とパフォーマンスの向上

-------

もしNotedに満足いただけているならアプリに高評価を与えてください。素晴らしい評価を与えてくださったことに感謝いたします。

Notedをご使用いただき誠にありがとうございます。常に皆様からのご意見をお待ちいたしております。いつでも‘EverythingNoted　へのツイートまたはsupport@notedapp.ioへのご意見をお待ちいたしております。

各種不具合の修正とパフォーマンスの向上
-------

もしNotedに満足いただけているならアプリに高評価を与えてください。素晴らしい評価を与えてくださったことに感謝いたします。

Notedをご使用いただき誠にありがとうございます。常に皆様からのご意見をお待ちいたしております。いつでも‘EverythingNoted　へのツイートまたはsupport@notedapp.ioへのご意見をお待ちいたしております。

各種不具合の修正とパフォーマンスの向上

-------

もしNotedに満足いただけているならアプリに高評価を与えてください。素晴らしい評価を与えてくださったことに感謝いたします。

Noted 1.8 新しいスマートラベル提案の機能搭載するためにAppleの機械学習(Core ML 2)を使用してください。

私たちの新しいAIシステムは、あなたが入力したキーワード、名前、場所を分析します。そしてあなたが#時間タグを追加するときに候補を表示して、メモをより効率的にします。

このアップデートはiPadのキーボードショートカットをサポートし、その他の修正と改良が含まれています。

-------

Noted 2.0は、インテリジェント再生、ダークモードを追加します、また、iOS 13、iPadOS 13、およびwatchOS 6をサポートしています。

• インテリジェント再生を使用して時間と労力を節約する
インテリジェント再生では、記録された音声の性質を識別し、ノイズと空白を自動的にスキップし、音声のみをピックアップして時間と労力を節約します。

私たちは独自の機械学習モデルのトレーニングにたくさんの時間も費やし、さまざまな種類の音声を分析して、それが音声、拍手の音

Notedの新しいチェックリスト機能により、ワークシートの整理と買い物リストの作成が簡単になります。

• Noted検索機能強化
エディターで直接検索し、目的標の文字列にジャンプします

• 問題の修正
- Apple Watchのインターフェースの問題を修正
- Watchからすべての録音を再送信する新機能
- 描画インターフェイスに元に戻す/やり直し/クリアボタンを表示する
- 多数の画像を処理するエディターの機能を強化します

--

Notedの新しいチェックリスト機能により、ワークシートの整理と買い物リストの作成が簡単になります。

• Noted検索機能強化
エディターで直接検索し、目的標の文字列にジャンプします

• 問題の修正
- Apple Watchのインターフェースの問題を修正
- Watchからすべての録音を再送信する新機能
- 描画インターフェイスに元に戻す/やり直し/クリアボタンを表示する
- 多数の画像を処理するエディターの機能を強化します

--

Noted2.0.7は、カスタムフォントをサポートしています！ 同時にエディターのテキストサイズを調整することもできます。

問題の修正
- インテリジェント再生の停滞問題を修正
- AirPodsおよびBluetoothデバイスでの「VoiceOver」の改善

---

もしNotedに満足いただけているならアプリに高評価を与えてください。素晴らしい評価を与えてくださったことに感謝いたします。

あなたは話します、私は書きます！

Notedは、ディクテーション機能を追加します。この機能は、マイクから音声を読み取り、テキストに変換します。 さらに、最新の音声認識テクノロジーを使用すると、ネットワークデータが不要になり、いつでもどこでもメモを書くことができます。

Noted 2.3 がビデオの世界に入ります。

メモを書くときは、いきいきに書く必要があります。 新しいビデオのインポート機能を使用すると、教室やWeb会議の事前に記録されたビデオをNotedにインポートしてノートを組み合わせることができます。

新しいキーボードショートカット：
•アスタリスク、ハイフン、プラス記号-記号のリストを作成します
•-[] - チェックボックスを作成します
•> - 参照ブロックを作成

新しいトラックパッドのサ

Noted 2.3 がビデオの世界に入ります。

メモを書くときは、いきいきに書く必要があります。 新しいビデオのインポート機能を使用すると、教室やWeb会議の事前に記録されたビデオをNotedにインポートしてノートを組み合わせることができます。

新しいキーボードショートカット：

新しいトラックパッドのサ

Noted 2.4 continues its adventures into Web Notes - a new way to share notes with your friends and colleagues!

You can now create a web link directly from the app, and make your recordings available to anyone, even if they don't have Noted.
